page.title: 02A DAY IN ELIZABETHS LIFE
page.content: Elizabeth lives at Heatherslaw Farm. She is 13. She gets up at 7.30 a.m. and sets off for school at 8o'clock.She goes to school by bus. She does a different lesson first,every day but her favourite lesson is cookery .At playtime she feeds the gerbils. She has school dinners and her favourite dinner is cheese pasty and chips. She finishes school at 3.30.She gets home from school at 10 past 4. After school she does her homework.She is a guide and they meet every Thursday in Ford. She goes to bed at 9 or half past.
